title: Help Me!
body:
I am trying to change my email account setting to a different one. But the problem is that I can't because I forgot the sign in to regular email account. I used up a lot of $$$ for this account so I don't want to lose it. Any thoughts would really help me. Thanks! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
If you reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can work with you to get this resolved.

Let me know if you have any questions.
